title: Composer Spotlight: Amir Shpilman
excerpt: Behind the scenes of our collaboration on IMPACT Opera - an ambitious contemporary work for orchestra, choir, and two stuntwomen.
content_html:
IMPACT Opera in rehearsal - Photos by Johan Planefeldt

When Opera Meets Innovation

Our collaboration with composer Amir Shpilman on IMPACT Opera pushed the boundaries of both contemporary opera and music engraving technology. This ambitious work for orchestra, choir, and two stuntwomen required us to develop entirely new approaches to score preparation.

The Challenge

IMPACT demanded versatile and advanced notation techniques that pushed conventional music software to its limits. The score included:

Complex Rhythmic Structures

Polyrhythmic passages requiring precise coordination between multiple time signatures

Extended Techniques

Unconventional playing techniques requiring custom notation symbols

Multimedia Integration

Synchronization cues for stuntwomen and electronic elements

Large Ensemble

Orchestra, choir, and soloists requiring 80+ individual parts

Our Solution: Custom Plugin Development

Under intense production pressure, we developed a custom Sibelius plugin specifically for this project. This wasn't just about engraving—it was about creating a complete workflow solution.

Plugin Features:

  • 1
    Automated Part Generation: Intelligent extraction of individual parts with proper formatting
  • 2
    Custom Symbol Library: Extended techniques notation made accessible
  • 3
    Consistency Checking: Automated verification of notation standards
  • 4
    Batch Processing: Simultaneous updates across all score materials

"Working with ZSCORE wasn't just about getting beautiful notation—they became true collaborators in realizing the vision of IMPACT. Their technical innovation enabled artistic possibilities we never thought feasible."

— Amir Shpilman, Composer

The Results

75%

Time Saved

In score preparation and revision cycles

80+

Perfect Parts

Individual performance materials generated

0

Errors

In final performance materials

🏆 Project Impact

IMPACT Opera successfully premiered with flawless materials, and our custom plugin has since been refined and integrated into our standard workflow, benefiting all subsequent projects.

Every challenging project teaches us something new. IMPACT showed us that the intersection of technology and artistry is where true innovation happens.
